Package bankService

Class BankService

java.lang.Object
bankService.BankService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Banking
public class BankService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Banking
Implements functionality for performing bank transactions and retrieving information on the bank. Interacts with a notification service for sending messages to customers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface bankService.Banking

  • Constructor Details

    • BankService

      public BankService​(java.lang.String name, int routingNumber, long checkingStartNumber, long savingsStartNumber)
      Creates and initializes a new bank service.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the bank.
      routingNumber - number used to direct data or documents to the bank.
      checkingStartNumber - number used to start the sequence of checking accounts that can be created.
      savingsStartNumber - number used to start the sequence of savings accounts that can be created.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • getAccounts

      public java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts()
      Specified by:
      getAccounts in interface Banking
      Returns:
      a list of bank accounts stored in the bank.

    • createAccount

      public boolean createAccount​(Customer owner, double startBalance, Banking.AccountType accountType)
      Create an account for a new or existing customer.
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface Banking
      Parameters:
      owner - customer that will own the account being created.
      startBalance - initial balance of the account.
      accountType - type of the account e.g., checking, savings.
      Returns:
      true if the account creation is successful, false otherwise.
